MAPPER = new ObjectMapper()
            .configure(JsonParser.Feature.ALLOW_SINGLE_QUOTES, true)
            .configure(JsonParser.Feature.ALLOW_UNQUOTED_FIELD_NAMES, true)
            .registerModule(new JavaTimeModule())
            .registerModule(new Jdk8Module())
